full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,SKYABS MGON RJE BTZUN DAM PA BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I BKA' RTZOM THOG MA TSIGS SU BCAD PA'I 'GREL PA DAM PA'I DGONGS DON GSAL BAR BYED PA'I NGO MTSAR GTAM GYI PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES PA  'DI NI DAD STOBS KYI DBANG PHYUG PHUN TSOGS PE LE'I SHOG MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS TSUL LA MKHYEN PA'I SPYANG YANGS PA DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG DANG, ,SHOG DE'I DON GNYER CAN DU MAS YANG DANG YANG DU ^TSIGS BCAD DE LA 'GREL PA ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO LDOG MI NUS PAR, ,^SKYABS MGON DAM PA NYID KYI THUGS RJE'I 'OG KHO NAR 'TSO BA'I ^BKA' DBANGS THA SHAL HU RE GYI BLA MING 'DZIN PA RIGS PA SMRA BA PAn CHUNG NGAG DBANG MKHAS GRUB KYIS SUG BRIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'JAM MGON BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
